mapper.select: SELECT ap.*, t.id as tag_id, t.name as tag_name FROM algorithm_problem ap LEFT JOIN algorithm_problem_tag apt ON ap.id = apt.algorithm_problem_id LEFT JOIN tag t ON apt.tag_id = t.id WHERE ap.is_deleted = false ORDER BY ap.created_at DESC LIMIT #{offset}, #{pageSize}

SELECT ap.*, t.id as tag_id, t.name as tag_name FROM algorithm_problem ap LEFT JOIN algorithm_problem_tag apt ON ap.id = apt.algorithm_problem_id LEFT JOIN tag t ON apt.tag_id = t.id WHERE ap.id = #{problemId}

SELECT ap.*, t.id as tag_id, t.name as tag_name FROM algorithm_problem ap LEFT JOIN algorithm_problem_tag apt ON ap.id = apt.algorithm_problem_id LEFT JOIN tag t ON apt.tag_id = t.id WHERE ap.is_deleted = false AND ( #{keyword} IS NULL OR CASE #{searchType} WHEN 'title' THEN ap.title LIKE CONCAT('%', #{keyword}, '%') WHEN 'tag' THEN EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM algorithm_problem_tag apt2 JOIN tag t2 ON apt2.tag_id = t2.id WHERE apt2.algorithm_problem_id = ap.id AND t2.name LIKE CONCAT('%', #{keyword}, '%')) END ) ORDER BY ap.created_at DESC LIMIT #{offset}, #{pageSize}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO algorithm_problem (title, url, user_id) VALUES (#{title}, #{url}, #{userId})
mapper.update: UPDATE algorithm_problem SET title = #{algorithmProblem.title}, url = #{algorithmProblem.url}, updated_at = CURRENT_DATE WHERE id = #{problemId} AND is_deleted = false
